nodes.text: The Huntsman was a starship that served in the navy of the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War. The vessel lost its entire crew during a number of attacks carried out by the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing some time after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. The New Republic Intelligence officer Caern Adan listed the loss of the Huntsman's crew among a number of the 204th's actions since the Battle of Endor,  several weeks after the battle, when talking with an IT-O Interrogation Unit about the fighter wing.
The Huntsman was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, which was written by Alexander Freed.
